## FileSuggestManager.matchBlock() method

Match search fragments to a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matchBlock(
        path: string,
        file: TFile,
        block: BlockCache,
        sourcePath: null | string,
        content: string,
        text_parts: string[]
    ): SearchResult | null;
```
